description: The central plaza of Fish-Man Island where the major battle between the Straw Hat Pirates and the New Fish-Man Pirates takes place.

keyEvents.title: Fukaboshi Broadcasts Hody's Truth
keyEvents.description: Fukaboshi's broadcast revealing Hody's 'Nothing' response is heard throughout the plaza and all of Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: The plaza serves as the central battleground where the truth about Hody is revealed to everyone.

keyEvents.title: Wadatsumi's Mega Monk Transformation
keyEvents.description: Wadatsumi transforms into his Mega Nyudo form in the plaza, crushing allies and enemies alike.
keyEvents.significance: Major combat event in the plaza battle.

keyEvents.title: Robin Defeats Hammond
keyEvents.description: Robin defeats Hammond in the plaza and frees enslaved humans who then join the fight.
keyEvents.significance: Shifts the momentum of the battle in the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Neptune Army Arrives
keyEvents.description: The Minister of the Right and Neptune Army arrive at the plaza to officially support the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Government forces officially join the battle at the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Hody Charges at Luffy
keyEvents.description: After the broadcast, Hody charges maniacally at Luffy and Shirahoshi in the plaza.

statusHistory.reason: Active battle location during the Fish-Man Island conflict

description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, beneath the Red Line. Home to both fish-men and merfolk.

keyEvents.title: Island-Wide Broadcast of Hody's Truth
keyEvents.description: Fukaboshi's broadcast revealing the truth about Hody Jones is heard across all of Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: The entire island learns the truth about the New Fish-Man Pirates' baseless hatred.

keyEvents.title: Noah Threatens the Island
keyEvents.description: Noah begins falling toward Fish-Man Island again, threatening to destroy it. Neptune mentions this fulfills ancient prophecies.
keyEvents.significance: Connects to ancient prophecies about Noah and the island's fate.

statusHistory.reason: Under threat from Noah but still standing

description: A massive ancient ship half the size of Fish-Man Island, said to be built during the Void Century. It has deep connections to Joy Boy and ancient prophecies about bringing the Fish-Men to the surface.

keyEvents.title: Noah Falls Toward Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: The great ark Noah begins falling toward Fish-Man Island again, threatening its destruction. Neptune cryptically mentions this was prophesied.
keyEvents.significance: Emphasizes Noah's connection to ancient prophecies and its potential to destroy Fish-Man Island.
